summary: CHEVY EQUINOX 2012, BUT THE TRUCK A MONTH AGO, NOTICE A RATTLE NOISE ON THE ENGINE, AFTER A MONTH +1000 MILES DRIVING, NEED TO ADD 2Q OF OIL,  TODAY 7/17 HAS NO OIL.
